item.description:
Joe Tecce's (http://www.joetecces....) is one of the North End's most famous restaurants. It goes back more than 60 years. The cuisine is Neapolitan. They have a large patio out front. We'll dine there, weather permitting. Otherwise, we'll eat inside in an atmospheric room. Join us at the bar inside for cocktails and mingling between 6:00 and 7:00. We'll sit down and order a little after 7:00. Price ranges are: Appetizers $7.95-12.95, Pizza $12, Pasta $16.95-19.95, Entrees $16.95-29.95. We add 25% for tax (7%) and tip (18%). It would be best to bring cash, as we won't get individual tabs. The restaurant is on N. Washington St., diagonally across from NEBO. North Station or Haymarket will work on the T. The best garage to use is the Parcel 7 Garage. http://local.yahoo.co... (validated), although they also have a valet. (more expensive I'm sure) So let's experience a taste of Naples, right here in Boston.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the bar until 7:00.
item.name: Joe Tecce's Ristorante-Dinner al Fresco
